long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dealogic SourceSpy Scraper, for Dealogic employees.
Authenticates to Dealogic SourceSpy API, scrapes the currently opened article, uploads it to SourceSpy, waits until it has been processed and opens a new tab with the processed article.
